price: Na yaadadhaa, Anis isiniin yaadadhaa, Galata naaf galchaa, Natti hin kafarinaa.
arabic: فَٱذۡكُرُونِيٓ أَذۡكُرۡكُمۡ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لِي وَلَا تَكۡفُرُونِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-udh'kurūnī adhkur'kum wa-ush'kurū lī walā takfurūni
